definition: plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: The last stage of the birth process involves the delivery of the placenta, which is now called the afterbirth.
sentences.chinese: 分娩的最后一个阶段是胎盘的出来。

sentences.english: Conclusion The placenta might be an another hematopoietic organ in ontogeny .
sentences.chinese: 结论胎盘是胎儿期造血器官之一。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the relation between fetal placenta product free estriol level and pregnancy outcome. Methods The free estriol was detected with immunofluorescence in pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胎儿胎盘产物游离雌三醇水平与妊娠的关系。

sentences.english: Sometimes, an abortionist fails to evacuate the placenta from the uterus.
sentences.chinese: 通常，流产者在从子宫中娩出胎盘时会失败。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the significance of diagnosing placenta accreta by ultrasonography detection.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨超声检测对植入性胎盘诊断的意义。

sentences.english: Hypoxia may be a cause of high expression of leptin in pre-eclamptic placenta.
sentences.chinese: 缺氧可能是子痫前期胎盘组织瘦素高表达的原因。

sentences.english: There were not low placenta praevia in these cases.
sentences.chinese: 本组病例中未遇到低置型前置胎盘。

sentences.english: Pla cental disorder was the main indication of emergency hysterectomy.
sentences.chinese: 胎盘因素是产科急症子宫切除术的主要指征。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the ultrasonographic characteristics of placenta abruption and their clinical diagnostic value.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胎盘早剥的超声分析方法及临床意义。

sentences.english: Conclusion The key point of reducing the incidence of pernicious placenta praevia is to step down the rate of cesarean section.
sentences.chinese: 结论降低剖宫产率是减少凶险型前置胎盘发生的关键。

sentences.english: The virus traverses the placenta and, may seriously interfere with organogenesis.
sentences.chinese: 病毒可透过胎盘，可能严重妨碍胎儿器官的发生。

sentences.english: Perera says. 'The placenta is not the perfect barrier we once thought.
sentences.chinese: 胎盘并不像我们曾经认为的那样是一个完美的屏障。

sentences.english: Objective:To Study of distinction between ultrasonography and clinical pathologic diagnose in abruption placentae.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究胎盘早剥的超声诊断与临床病理之间的差异。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the approach of ultrasound diagnosis of the placental abruption and the characteristic of acoustic images and graphs.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胎盘早剥的超声诊断方法及声像图特征。

sentences.english: Mammals have eaten the placentas of their offspring since time began.
sentences.chinese: 自从地球上有了哺乳动物，吃胎盘就开始了。

sentences.english: Conclusion MRI is valuable for prenatal diagnosis of placental invasion.
sentences.chinese: 结论产前MRI对于诊断胎盘植入具有重要价值。

definition: (zoology, medicine) mother's body/(chemistry etc) parent/matrix/(statistics) population/parent population
